content.name: Contemplations of the Ancient Ones
content.description: At end of your Hero phase, pick **1** friendly **Slann** replace the spell they know from the **Lore of Celestial Domination** table. Choose or roll for the new spell, rolling again if you generate the previous spell.

content.name: Sacred Asterisms
content.description: At the start of your hero phase pick **1** of the following until your next hero phase: **"The Great Drake"**, **"The Hunter's Steed"**, and **"The Sage's Staff"**

content.name: The Great Drake
content.description: If picked (Sacred Asterisms), in combat phase, pick **1** friendly **Seraphon Hero**. Until end of that phase you can **add 1** to attacks of hero's melee weapons

content.name: The Hunter's Steed
content.description: If picked (Sacred Asterisms), **Add 1** to run rolls and charge rolls for Seraphon units.

content.name: The Sage's Staff
content.description: If picked (Sacred Asterisms), **pick 1** Seraphon Wizard. You can **add 1** to casting or dispelling rolls and **add 1** to unbinding rolls.

content.name: Incandescent Rectrices
content.description: The first time bearer is slain, before removing them from the battlefield, roll a dice. On a **1-3, the bearer is slain**. On a **4-6, the bearer is not slain**, all wounds allocated to them are healed, and any wounds that currently remain to be allocated to them are negated.

content.name: Tide of Serpents
content.description: casting value of **8**. If successfully cast, **pick 1 enemy unit within 12"** of the caster and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit. For each **5+**, that unit suffers **1 mortal wound**.
